message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you would find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $95. Let me know if this works for you.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $105.  Let me know if that works for you.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer. Unfortunately, I am still not able to meet at $105. However, I am willing to go up to $100. Let me know if this is feasible.
